title: Asymptotic formulas for the coefficients of the truncated theta series
abstract:
Motivated by the groundbreaking work of Andrews and Merca, truncated theta
series have been extensively studied over the years. In particular, Merca made
conjectures on the non-negativity of the coefficient of $q^N$ in truncated
series from the Jacobi triple product identity and the quintuple product
identity. In this paper, using Wright's Circle Method, we establish asymptotic
formulas for the coefficients of truncated theta series and prove that Merca's
conjectures are true for sufficiently large $N$.
